entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Drizzle beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 20 near noon. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
